channel.title: Looking for server help (718+)
channel.description: Im creating a server but i have some trouble with adding the construction thingy so players can build their own houses and some other code stuff if ur interested to help me add me on skype : tedbie the ppl that help me the most will be rewarded with a Admin rank if the server goes 24/7(Online). :P

item.title: Looking for server help (718+)
item.dc:creator: @tedbie tedbie
item.description:
@tedbie wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:6, topic:540490”][quote author=tedbie link=topic=659350.msg4409519#msg4409519 date=1393094998]

Nobody is going to do this for you. Just work around with spawning objects and object clicking. It shouldn’t be too hard given you have the correct object IDs. Then you will need to save them to the player file.

Thx for the info but can u just help me with 1 little thing cuz im a beginner with coding and stuff add me on skype ore somthin ill send u pics
[/quote]I don’t do skype. You’re going to have to learn how everyone else does. By reading. I gave you a pointer on how to achieve this all I can now do is wish you luck.[/quote]

Thx

Read full topic
